Attention!

This event is not yet released on the Global server; the following information is based on translations which may not match the official English localization and will be updated when the Global release is announced.

Attention!

Until confirmed to be otherwise, the contents of this collaboration/crossover event will neither be added to Record Restoration nor the Terminal.

Somniloquium Serenum
Abbreviation
SS
Type
Crossover Side Story
Crossovers with
BanG Dream! Ave Mujica
Etymology
Latin for "tranquil sleep talk"
In Other Languages
Chinese
无忧梦呓
Release
CN date
2025/09/04–2025/09/18

Somniloquium Serenum is the thirty-ninth Side Story in Arknights that also acts as a crossover with BanG Dream! Ave Mujica.

Contents

  • 1 Operations
    • 1.1 Somniamus Omnes
    • 1.2 Amor Fati
  • 2 Additions
  • 3 Operators
    • 3.1 Headhunting
  • 4 Dreamland Puzzle
    • 4.1 Rhodes Island Letter
    • 4.2 Morpheus's Riddle
    • 4.3 Coretton's Museum
  • 5 Castle of Dreams Training Drill
  • 6 Greeting Ceremony of the Marionettes
  • 7 Store
  • 8 Outfits
  • 9 Furniture
  • 10 Miscellaneous
    • 10.1 Operator Records/Paradox Simulations
  • 11 Trivia
  • 12 Navigation

Clear 1-10 to access SS operations.

All SS operations are worth 26 .

Additions[edit]

This section is a stub.

You can help the Arknights Terra Wiki by expanding it.

Operators[edit]

  • The following Operators will gain 50% more Trust (except from Annihilation):

  • The following Operators receive their second Operator Module:
    • Blaze (CEN-Y)
    • Virtuosa (RIT-Y)

Headhunting[edit]

Main article: Headhunting/Banners/Upcoming

The Cantilena Puppae limited crossover headhunting banner is featured.

  • A single Cantilena Puppae Headhunting Permit can be claimed from the first and eighth day of Greetings From the Marionettes login event.

Dreamland Puzzle[edit]

Rhodes Island Letter[edit]

Players can receive a letter everyday upon server reset time that contains several rewards and Dreamland Puzzle.

You can help the Arknights Terra Wiki by expanding it.

Greeting Ceremony of the Marionettes[edit]

Players can obtain various rewards by logging in the game from September 4, 2025 to September 18, 2025.

Store[edit]

  • Fantastic Crafts and Letters from Wessex are now available in the Certificate Store and Universal Certificates Exchange Area.

Outfits[edit]

The following outfits are available in the Outfit Store until September 25, 2025:

New

Furniture[edit]

The Hall of Mutated Dream Castle furniture theme is available; some of its parts are obtained from Morpheus's Riddle while others are available in Coretton's Museum and Furniture Store.

Miscellaneous[edit]

  • Friend Slot is expanded from 100 to 125 slots.
  • Favorited friends feature is introduced with 5 slots initially available.
    • Favorited friends will appear before other friends in many communication user interface, e.g. friend list, clue recipient selection in Base, etc.
  • Skill range now can be viewed in operator's status screen.

Operator Records/Paradox Simulations[edit]

New Operator Records and/or Paradox Simulations are added for the following Operators:

Trivia[edit]

  • Somniloquium Serenum is the first event that features two welfare Operators instead of one.
    • It is also the only event where all newly introduced Operators receive their outfits on release.
  • The song used in the PV is Ave Mujica's debut song "Black Birthday". The Anime ending theme, Georgette Me, Georgette You is used as the BGM for the Dynamic UI theme.
    • The arrangement of Georgette Me, Georgette You used as the BGM only consists of the piano and the violin as the instruments. As per each character's canon media, the piano is played by Togawa Sakiko while the violin is played by Amiya.
  • During the event period, Ave Mujica isn't even playable in BanG Dream!'s mobile game, thus marking this crossover event as their unofficial video game debut.
